public RecipeSteps getStep(@PathVariable

        Returns:

      • getRecipeSteps

        @RequestMapping(value="/recipe/{recipeId}")
public java.util.List<RecipeSteps> getRecipeSteps(@PathVariable
                                                                                               java.lang.Integer recipeId)
        Returns a list of all the RecipeSteps for a specific recipe
        Parameters:
        recipeId - the ID of the recipe to get the RecipeSteps
        Returns:
        a list of the RecipeSteps for the desired recipe

      • addRecipeStep

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                value="/recipe/{recipeId}")
public void addRecipeStep(@PathVariable
                                                                                                     java.lang.Integer recipeId,
                                                                                                     @RequestBody
                                                                                                     RecipeSteps recipeSteps)
        Creates a new RecipeSteps object as the NEWEST step for a recipe
        Parameters:
        recipeId - the ID of the recipe the step is to be created for
        recipeSteps - the recipe step to be created (time, description)

      • addStepToRecipe

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                value="/recipe/{recipeId}/{stepNumber}")
public void addStepToRecipe(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                    java.lang.Integer recipeId,
                                                                                                                    @PathVariable
                                                                                                                    java.lang.Integer stepNumber,
                                                                                                                    @RequestBody
                                                                                                                    RecipeSteps step)
        Creates a new recipe step at with a specific step number
        Parameters:
        recipeId - the ID of the recipe the step is to be created for
        stepNumber - the step number for the recipe step
        step - the recipe step to be created (time, description)

      • updateStep

        @RequestMapping(method=PUT,
                value="/{recipeStepId}")
public void updateStep(@PathVariable
                                                                                              java.lang.Integer recipeStepId,
                                                                                              @RequestBody
                                                                                              RecipeSteps newStep)
        Updates a current recipe step without changing its step number
        Parameters:
        recipeStepId - the ID of the recipe step to be updated
        newStep - the new recipe step object (time, description)

      • deleteRecipeSteps

        @RequestMapping(method=DELETE,
                value="/recipe/{recipeId}")
public void deleteRecipeSteps(@PathVariable
                                                                                                           java.lang.Integer recipeId)
        Deletes all of the recipe steps for a specific recipe
        Parameters:
        recipeId - the ID of the recipe the steps are to be deleted

        Deletes a specific recipe step
